title: Good Omens Show Crowley's Lullaby | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership: http://bit.ly/GoodOmensPrimeVideo
Crowley has such a soothing voice!! You go you Goth Mary Poppins!
The kid that bit into the ice cream is the true anti christ.

Lyrics:
Go to sleep and dream of pain, 
doom and darkness, blood and brains, sleep so sweet my darling boy, 
you will rule when Earth’s destroyed.
The magician!Aziraphale scene is going to end me
description:
Crowley's lullaby is a trap to distract you long enough for Satan to take your soul. Watch the Good Omens show streaming now on Prime Video.
